body:
WhatsApp Support Team,

I want to appeal against the blocking of my WhatsApp account number {no} due to spam. I believe this is a mistake and I have not violated any WhatsApp policies.

Please kindly review and restore my account as soon as possible.

Thank you.

Привет, добрый день, WhatsApp.

Моя учетная запись WhatsApp с номером {no} была заблокирована, и я не понимаю причину блокировки.

Пожалуйста, помогите разблокировать мой аккаунт.

Спасибо.

Good afternoon WhatsApp Team,

I would like to submit an appeal regarding my WhatsApp account {no}, which was blocked due to spam.

I kindly request a re-evaluation and restoration of my account.

Best regards.
